name: The Sci-Fi Adventure
description:
Dear Sir/Madam,

A stranger woke up in an intergalactic prison without memory, and with all these robots trying to kill him? he needs to find a way to conquer his freedom,  play  ‘The  Sci-Fi Adventure’ for FREE today!

-

Game controls (keyboard): Movement: Left and Right / Jump: Space / Attack: Shift / Interact: E / Doors: Enter

-
